duties_responsibilities.duty:
Project Lead 
Responsible for the daily functions of handscoring contracts, including scheduling, resource planning, developing item specific training, coordinating with program and project managers, managing a team of Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers, and performing post-project work and data analysis.

Content Expertise 
Thorough knowledge of science topics for Elementary, Middle, and High School Science, and understanding and application of state and national science standards.

Logistics and Communication 
Clear communication to a variety of roles daily, including chat, email, phone, posted reports, and videoconference meetings. In-person and virtual interactions with the customer and other educators.

Training and Coaching 
Mentor and train Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers, as well as train Science and potentially Math items to a large and varied scorer population.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree required, with degree within Life Science or Physical Sciences strongly preferred. Additional Math college courses are preferred.
